channel.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
channel.description:
here's an idea, i'd like to know everyones opinions.
Moparisthebest has stated that there will be no subscriber or donator rank, no form of players spending real life money for gain will happen at all.
Some people want a slight advantage though, therefore i came up with an idea.
Regular player: 4x exp rates Advertiser: 5x exp rates
this "Advertiser" rank would be VERY easy to get.
How to achieve this rank? simply advertise the server, no not on other pserver websites. Youtube videos, facebook groups/status's, your regular forums that your apart of, leaving posts etc.
there are lots of ways to spread the word around, simply showing yourself getting the word out about the server will make you an Advertiser rank for 1 month, getting a slight exp bonus.
in the end, you gain exp, you also gain more players for the server. it's a win win situation.
thoughts?
This rank would be invisible, the only difference you would see is more exp, no special color name, no forum rank or anything.

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @dexto dexto
item.description:
@dexto wrote:

Moparisthebest:

We just aren’t going to do this at all I think. No ranks/awards at all.

Best option, or else whining continues

Hurr durr. No rank system at all, please.

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

[quote=“All Day, post:37, topic:392882”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=490055.msg3583839#msg3583839 date=1304017020]

I think giving them some sought of ‘‘Advertiser’’ Title on forums would be better, As people may want to get noticed for there work, Just like on certain forums you see peoples ranks for how often the post, ‘’ First time poster ‘’ ‘‘Noob poster’’ ‘‘L33T Poster’’ or whatever, Maybe if they get an ‘’ Advertiser ‘’ It’s nothing spectacular but these things encourage people.

Absolutely not, I hate arbitrary/subscriber/donator ranks on forums. It gives people a false sense of superiority. I won’t do it.

The more I think about this idea in general, the more I hate it.
[/quote]

It’s a silly idea, but sadly the RSC community feels they needed to be rewarded for everything they do. It’s quite upsetting.[/quote]

Exactly, Im not saying i agree with the idea at all, It’s just the way the community is, And just as All Day says, They feel the need to be rewarded for what they do

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

terrible idea, first off, this means you, xent would have to keep up with and hand out this rank based on whoever advertised, meaning sorting through proof or just giving it out to whoever says they advertised, secondly, if they need some sort of reward for trying to make the server successful, then they should just fuck off back to rsce anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:33, topic:392882”][quote author=elyad link=topic=490055.msg3583828#msg3583828 date=1304016423]
I think giving them some sought of ‘‘Advertiser’’ Title on forums would be better, As people may want to get noticed for there work, Just like on certain forums you see peoples ranks for how often the post, ‘’ First time poster ‘’ ‘‘Noob poster’’ ‘‘L33T Poster’’ or whatever, Maybe if they get an ‘’ Advertiser ‘’ It’s nothing spectacular but these things encourage people.
[/quote]

Absolutely not, I hate arbitrary/subscriber/donator ranks on forums. It gives people a false sense of superiority. I won’t do it.

The more I think about this idea in general, the more I hate it.[/quote]

It’s a silly idea, but sadly the RSC community feels they needed to be rewarded for everything they do. It’s quite upsetting.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @ilpuroil ilpuroil
item.description:
@ilpuroil wrote:

IMO I wouldn’t have higher rates for certain people who advertise. If people want the server to grow, then they should advertise without the incentives.

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @D.Shark D.Shark
item.description:
@D.Shark wrote:

I only use this website to see what people are still up too these days, since I’ve only ever checked the classic section on this website I’ve never actually seen Moparisthebest post, but after seeing 4-5 posts from him for the first time in this category I must say his moral standpoint on this server is very impressive. If he’s in full control of this project I hope people will sign up and play it as it’s definitely shouldn’t be overlooked, seems like it could be a non-corrupt well lead one if he ensures the moderators rule with the same ideology as him.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @Iron_Maiden1 Iron Maiden
item.description:
@Iron_Maiden1 wrote:

yea the best advertisement is typical word of mouth, players here telling their friends to go play.

no status in forum or advantages in game.

if you want to help by telling your friends or donating that’s fine, but u wont get rewarded…

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

elyad:

I think giving them some sought of ‘‘Advertiser’’ Title on forums would be better, As people may want to get noticed for there work, Just like on certain forums you see peoples ranks for how often the post, ‘’ First time poster ‘’ ‘‘Noob poster’’ ‘‘L33T Poster’’ or whatever, Maybe if they get an ‘’ Advertiser ‘’ It’s nothing spectacular but these things encourage people.

Absolutely not, I hate arbitrary/subscriber/donator ranks on forums. It gives people a false sense of superiority. I won’t do it.

The more I think about this idea in general, the more I hate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @Ch3rry Ch3rry
item.description:
@Ch3rry wrote:

I’m gonna try and advertise on a few gaming forums… Loads of people are looking for something “New” to play that is out of the ordinary…Look how minecraft boomed. Tbh though, when advertising I wouldn’t even bother calling it “runescape classic.” As bad as rs2 is, that’d just turn me against it if I knew nothing about the game. I think sticking to (Moparscape classic) would bring more.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @dexto dexto
item.description:
@dexto wrote:

Will do

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

[quote=“Shike, post:24, topic:392882”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=490055.msg3583423#msg3583423 date=1303962322]
This idea could work, though I’m not a very big fan. I wouldn’t worry about anything like this so early though. I think we are really getting ahead of ourselves here though, coming up with all sorts of great ideas before even the glimmer of a server appears.
[/quote]
Exactly and to add to that.

1-2x exp rates for the beginning, and then we can vote at a later date if the community want to raise them. As some of the other people have posted, it is easier to raise the exp rates than to lower them. Just my two cents.[/quote]
If you want 1-2x rates go play RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Sounds like a pain in the ass to regulate or control. Everyone that registers is going to say they advertise, how are you going to confirm/deny?

And I personally think increasing EXP rates to a select number of people, in any case, is just a downright bad idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’d prefer no one advertise this at all until it is well past beta stage, otherwise it would just make it look bad.

Also I never want anyone spamming to advertise this site, since I know for a fact non-cheating websites like tip.it and zybez don’t allow that sort of stuff, that just gives us a bad name if you spam it there. This is one of the reasons I don’t really like this idea, it encourages people to spam other forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @Shike Shike
item.description:
@Shike wrote:

Moparisthebest:

This idea could work, though I’m not a very big fan. I wouldn’t worry about anything like this so early though. I think we are really getting ahead of ourselves here though, coming up with all sorts of great ideas before even the glimmer of a server appears.

Exactly and to add to that.

1-2x exp rates for the beginning, and then we can vote at a later date if the community want to raise them. As some of the other people have posted, it is easier to raise the exp rates than to lower them. Just my two cents.

Read full topic

item.title: Subscriber/Advertiser idea for Moparscape Classic
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“Seek, post:19, topic:392882”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=490055.msg3583291#msg3583291 date=1303954083]

I like the concept but I think it could use some tweaks… Like I think that 1 month is too long, because then a person advertises once and they get a bonus for that…For a month… Maybe give like a week of bonus and after that they can advertise again…

500+ players advertising weekly becomes spam
[/quote]
Then I don’t like the idea… This basically just ends up making those who want more than x4 xp happy… Making this less and less like rsc[/quote]

trying to get lots of people to advertise, what else is a worthy reward? 4.5x? i don’t know. 10% more gold selling to general store?

Read full topic
